name: Operation Recon Spider
description: Operation Recon Spider is a climbing game about a curious, adventurous spider who made his own spaceship, so that he can explore the world! However on his journey he needs to hop out of his spacecraft and gather information, or recon if you will. On that journey he will meet many a threat as he is moving back up to his ship, finding the recon. Very threatening things for a spider that is!
